redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
ext-redmine: #5146, REDMINE-id

[bug][watch] Waiting for EPIC task to be completed before closing the LCD
redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
ext-redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
[Description in detail] The EPIC render-list mode flushes LCD in its callback, so we should wait for the EPIC task to be done before closing the LCD.
Change-Id: Ic23ad2e98630833d3d8c0f74ff1f1386de8a4a90

[opt][build] Prints the error message when an error is reported
redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
ext-redmine: #id, REDMINE-id
[Description in detail] During gcc checking of the environment, an error message will be printed if an error occurs
Change-Id: I299a33e10ad35b5d34b61e04acc372c2d8932b05 (cherry picked from commit 5df0148260175a1e52f6fff94074bbc5422a781f)
